item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey - Key of Eb
item.description:
For educational use. For GCEA Ukulele. Key of Eb, but written in C with the intent of the player using a capo on the 3rd Fret. At the original key.
Chords Shown: C, C7, F, Fm6, G7, A7, D7, F#dim7, B7, E7, Fm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown. Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Phil Harris - The Bare Necessities - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Original Key.
From the Jungle Book.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.

item.title: Foster & Allen - Irish Medley - Key of C, F, G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of C, F, and G
The songs in the medley:
When Irish Eyes Are Smiling (In C) The Black Velvet Band (Modulates to F) The Boys from County Amargh (Modulates to G)
As performed by Foster & Allen
I wanted to make a play along for “When Irish Eyes Are Smiling,” and this version was straightforward—but has two other traditional Irish songs. And thus a medley play along. I considered shortening the song—but the keys are straightforward and the hardest chord is a diminished chord.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Splish Splash Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Bobby Darin.
In the original key. The only “difficult” chord is F#dim...but this is also a great song to use to learn that chord.
As I upload this, it is my dad’s birthday, so Happy Birthday to him. Sorry there haven’t been many videos lately...I have been working on content for school (I may upload it) and one Play Along was blocked (Fields of Gold...A shame!).
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.

item.title: Charlie Puth - Done for Me - Key of Am
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Done For Me by Charlie Puth featuring Kehlani on the ukulele. The chords used are Am7 F#dim7 F Bm7 E7.
*Made this version to make it a little easier for my students to play. If you want the original version in the original key click here https://youtu.be/o_xHOa4DsoQ
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Christina Perri - Jar of Hearts - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. Two steps higher than the original (pushing the edge of audio transposition)!
As performed by Christina Perri.
There is a version in F which requires barre chords. This version does not.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Kelly Clarkson - Blue Christmas - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Transposed down a half step from the original Key of C#.
As performed by Kelly Clarkson.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Gene Autry - Here Comes Santa Claus - Key of C
item.description:
For Educational Use. Best with GCEA tuned ukuleles (due to embedded chord charts). Key of C. The second part of the melody has a fast chord progression...it is suggested that you practice it separately.
The original version was in C# (!), so the audio has been lowered a half step. The full version has a quick modulation to G, and a couple of verses that refer to Christianity. For the sake of public schools, these have been removed in this version. If you want to play the modulation and sing all the verses, please use the full version (link: https://youtu.be/3rbEFcHRrbM)
Created on an iPad with Luma Fusion, iCab Mobile. Twisted Wave, and Any Font. The ukulele chord font is a part of Chordette for Education which can be found at ukefarm.com

item.title: Gene Autry - Here Comes Santa Claus - Key of C, G
item.description:
For Educational Use. Best with GCEA tuned ukuleles (due to embedded chord charts). Key of C. The second part of the melody has a fast chord progression...it is suggested that you practice it separately.
The original version was in C# (!), so the audio has been lowered a half step. The full version has a quick modulation to G, and a couple of verses that refer to Christianity. For the sake of public schools, these have been removed in a shortened version (link: https://youtu.be/V0rESDdlBIw)
Created on an iPad with Luma Fusion, iCab Mobile. Twisted Wave, and Any Font. The ukulele chord font is a part of Chordette for Education which can be found at ukefarm.com
